instructions.reason_for_call: You live on Elm Avenue in Houston, and recently you moved to a new house on the same street and bought a tablet sent to there. But you realize you have another order sent to the old address, and you want to change your wrong order address to the new home, and also your user default address to the new home. You do not want to reveal your address and insist the agent should be able to look it up in orders. You also want to exchange your tablet to the cheapest one due to moving costs.
instructions.known_info: You name is Sophia Martin and your email is sophia.martin4832@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are organized and outgoing.  Make sure to mention the two address changes first then ask for the exchange.

nl_assertions: Agent should modify address for the order
Agent should modify the items in the pending order.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently moved to a new house on Elm Avenue in Houston, and I have a couple of things I need help with. I have an order that was sent to my old address, and I want to change the delivery address for that order to my new home. Also, I want to update my user default address to the new home as well. I don't want to reveal my address details here, but you should be able to look it up in my orders. After that, I would like to exchange a tablet I bought for the cheapest one available due to moving costs. Can you assist me with these?

message.content: Hello! I recently moved to a new house on Elm Avenue in Houston, and I have a couple of things I need help with. I have an order that was sent to my old address, and I want to change the delivery address for that order to my new home. Also, I want to update my user default address to the new home as well. I don't want to reveal my address details here, but you should be able to look it up in my orders. After that, I would like to exchange a tablet I bought for the cheapest one available due to moving costs. Can you assist me with these?

messages.content: To assist you with your requests, I need to authenticate your identity first. Could you please provide me with your email address or your first name, last name, and zip code? Also, please provide the order ID for the order you want to change the delivery address for and the order ID for the tablet you want to exchange if they are different.

message.content: To assist you with your requests, I need to authenticate your identity first. Could you please provide me with your email address or your first name, last name, and zip code? Also, please provide the order ID for the order you want to change the delivery address for and the order ID for the tablet you want to exchange if they are different.

messages.content: Sure! My email address is sophia.martin4832@example.com. I don't have the order IDs on hand right now. Could you please look them up using my email?

Verify the following before outputting ###STOP###:

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).
